attributes.action: Change the law to act as a deterrent for Animal cruelty with harsher penalties
attributes.additional_details:
See Laurie's  story 
https://m.facebook.com/RescueMeAnimalSanctuary
Kitten cooked in microwave
 http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2065202/Gina-Robins-killed-friends-kitten-microwave-revenge-boyfriend-reported-police.html

Ex boyfriend kills defenceless kittens and gets twenty weeks in jail.   No justice if those were my kittens I would not hesitate to maim the man.  He is a murderer
http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/566247/Boyfriend-revenge-snapping-necks-kittens-hammer
attributes.background: I would want justice our pets not such a light sentence of twenty weeks murdering defenceless kittens.   The law needs to change to protect our animals and serve as a deterrent to stop them doing the act in the first place.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104779 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
